title: The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; UN chief travels to Moscow to meet with Putin
content:
1. The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; UN chief travels to Moscow to meet with Putin  CNBC
  2. Russia-Ukraine live news: UN chief to meet Putin  Al Jazeera English
  3. Moscow cites risk of nuclear war as U.S., allies pledge heavier arms for Ukraine  Reuters
  4. Russia's Sergey Lavrov Warns of 'Real' Nuclear War Risk Over Ukraine  Bloomberg
  5. Russian foreign minister says possibility of nuclear conflict and outbreak of World War III over Ukraine is 'serious, real'  Yahoo News
contentSnippet:
